verbose_text: Through derivatization of a hit compound, we discovered ER-400583-00 (XREF_FIG), which inhibited the induction of HIF-1 reporter activity in response to hypoxia, with a half-maximal inhibitory concentration (IC 50) value of 7.9 nM (XREF_FIG).
evidence: ER-400583-00 ( XREF_FIG ), which inhibited the induction of HIF-1
